single_file.description: Whether to output all enums and structures to a single file.

output_dir.description: Directory to emit all files to, or file if single_file is set to true.

enums_output.description: Directory to emit all enums to, relative to the base output directory.

structures_output.description: Directory to emit all structures to, relative to the base output directory

requests_output.description: Directory to emit all request json and query parameter structures to, relative to the base output directory.

responses_output.description: Directory to emit all special respose structures to, relative to the base output directory

endpoints_output.description: File ot emit all endpoint declarations to, relative to the base output directory.

typings.description: Whether to emit typescript type declawrations
